mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_new_import_books WHERE SKU = #{sku} and QTY >= #{qty} and ADD_REDUCE_FLAG = '1' and QTY > 0 and RECORD_NO is not null

SELECT t.GUID, t.APP_TYPE, t.APP_TIME, t.APP_STATUS, t.ORDER_NO, t.EBP_CODE, t.EBP_NAME, t.EBC_CODE, t.EBC_NAME, t.LOGISTICS_NO as logisticsNo, "1210680001" as LOGISTICS_CODE, "天津顺丰速递有限公司" as LOGISTICS_NAME, t.COP_NO, t.PRE_NO, t.ASSURE_CODE, t.EMS_NO, t.INVT_NO, "I" as ieFlag, t.DECL_TIME, t.CUSTOM_CODE, t.PORT_CODE, t.IE_DATE, t.BUYER_IDTYPE, t.BUYER_IDNUMBER, t.BUYER_NAME, t.BUYER_TELEPHONE, t.CONSIGNEE_ADDRESS, t.AGENT_CODE, t.AGENT_NAME, t.AERA_CODE, t.AERA_NAME, t.TRADE_MODE, t.TRAF_MODE, t.TRAF_NO, t.LOCT_NO as voyageNo, "" as billNo, t.LOCT_NO as loctNo, t.LICENSE_NO, t.COUNTRY, t.FREIGHT, t.INSURE_FEE, t.CURRENCY, t.WRAP_TYPE, t.PACK_NO, t.GROSS_WEIGHT, t.NET_WEIGHT, t.NOTE, t.LOGISTICS_NO as ioSerialNo, b.DECL_NO, "天津中外运报关有限公司" as declPerson, "13388033561" as declTel, "" as mainDeclNo, "" as combineFlag, "" as orderNum, "" as declCount, "" as orderCount, "" as billCount, "" as paymentCount, t.PAY_SERIAL_NO, "FI" as declTypeCode, "Q121500201607000033" as entCode, "Q120000201808000039" as cbecode, "Q120000201609000060" as ciqLogisticsCode, "121500" as checkOrgCode, "1" as idType, t.WORTH, "C" as stockFlag, "" as consigneeNo, "华新琴" as consigneeCname, "" as consigneeEname, "13388033561" as consigneeTel, "" as consinorNo, "苏宁易购" as consignorCname, "" as consignorEname, "18622704752" as consignorTel, "天津东疆保税港区洛阳道600号3-3单元" as consignorAddress, "3201966A69" as idCard FROM t_new_import_inventory t LEFT JOIN t_new_import_books b ON b.ORDER_NO = t.ORDER_NO WHERE t.INVENTORY_ID = #{id} ;

SELECT t.GNUM,
t.ITEM_NO as ITEM_NO, t.ITEM_NAME as itemName, s.G_CODE, s.G_NAME as gname, s.G_MODEL, "" as barCode, t.COUNTRY as country, t.TRADE_COUNTRY, t.CURRENCY, "156" as ciqcurrency, t.QTY, t.QTY1, t.QTY2, s.UNIT, s.UNIT1, s.UNIT2, t.PRICE, t.TOTAL_PRICE, "" as note,
"Q120000201808000039" as entCode, s.SJ_RECORD_NO,
i.LOGISTICS_NO, i.ORDER_NO, i.PAY_SERIAL_NO, i.EBC_NAME, i.BUYER_NAME, i.BUYER_IDTYPE, s.SJ_COUNTRY as originCountryCode, s.UNIT as qtyUnitCode, "Q120000201808000039" as consigneeNo FROM t_new_import_inventory_detail t LEFT JOIN t_new_import_inventory i ON i.INVENTORY_ID = t.INVENTORY_ID
LEFT JOIN t_new_import_sku s ON s.ITEM_NO = t.ITEM_NO WHERE t.INVENTORY_ID = #{id} ;
SELECT DISTINCT b.RECORD_NO, b.GOODS_SERIALNO, b.DECL_NO FROM t_new_import_books b WHERE b.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND b.SKU = #{itemNo} GROUP BY b.RECORD_NO, b.GOODS_SERIALNO, b.DECL_NO ;
SELECT "2" as bizType, b.CON_MODEL, b.CON_NUM, b.CON_NO FROM t_new_import_inventory t LEFT JOIN t_new_import_books b ON b.ORDER_NO = t.ORDER_NO WHERE t.INVENTORY_ID = #{id} ;
SELECT "2" as bizType, t.ORDER_NO, b.DECL_NO FROM t_new_import_inventory t LEFT JOIN t_new_import_books b ON b.ORDER_NO = t.ORDER_NO WHERE t.INVENTORY_ID = #{id} ;
SELECT "1207980025" as copCode, "天津中外运报关有限公司" as copName, "DXP" as dxpMode, "DXPENT0000011432" as dxpId, "" as note
